C++ B3 Binary UMDF Market Data Handler - Sample Projects
============================================================

This directory contains the following sample projects:

1.  [**Backtesting**](Backtesting/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to use log replay.
2.  [**Benchmark**](Benchmark/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to measure the latency.
3.  [**GettingStarted**](GettingStarted/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to use basic functionality.
4.  [**All channels**](AllChannels/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to get data from many channels.
4.  [**LogPLayer**](LogPLayer/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to play multicast packet from the log.
